args: At the beginning of the menu the 6AM chime will play.
Every 5 ticks, I modify the background to create the 6 AM animation.
To change the animation, please inspect the "6AM2" folder in your project's sprites directory.

args: I play the 6 AM chime sound at the beginning of the menu.
I've also set a variable called "clickAllowed" to determine whether the player can click to skip the menu
Every 5 ticks, I modify the background to create the 6 AM animation.
To change the animation, please inspect the "6AM2" folder in your project's sprites directory.
Once the animation concludes, the player can click, triggering another background change to display the end screen
I'll play the music box sound, and if the player remains inactive, the game will teleport them back to the main menu

"NightLoad" is a data value used to inform the engine about which night to load.
In the game's start menu, it checks whether the player has completed the 5th, 6th, and 7th nights
